edge_1: Dellacroce was John Gotti's mentor and helped him secure the approval of the Five Families to eliminate Paul Castellano.
edge_2: John Gotti was close to Anthony Casso, whose son Frank died in a car accident on March 18, 1980.

edge_1: On December 16, 1985, Paul Castellano and his bodyguard Thomas Bilotti were gunned down outside Sparks Steak House.
edge_2: Paul Castellano was the boss of the Gambino family until his death in December 1985.
